title: Yappa Chappa Lyrics Kanithan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Yappa Chappa Song Lyics Kanithan
Singer: Anirudh Ravichander, Kalpana
Lyricist: Karky
Music: Drums Sivamani

Machaan Appo 
single-u
ippo aayittaan
dangulu
nayar kada chaayaathaan
cappuccnio goyathaan
roattu kada parottaa
star hotel casattaa
neththu vara localu
style ippo thookkalu

Dhamma thundu
kannukulla enna
isuthukinnaa

Immaam size-u
nenjukulla
enna adachu kinna

yappa chappa
dappa dappa
tippu tappu 
dappaa dappaa

parottaa pola
pichchi pottaa
poththal jeansa
otti puttaa

soupu boya
ninna enna.
super boy-ah
maaththi puttaa

manasa kasakki 
kadhal arakki 
sirichchaa!!!

yappa chappa
dappa dappa
tippu tappu 
dappaa dappaa

englishu pesi
nee lookkum podhu
I go vaeral levelu

iyyo, rendu mozhiyaala
nee pesum podhu
kadhil inikkudhu 
Tamil-u

honey kaniye
en heartu kulla 
thiththikura
adiyae

masakkaliyae
en kannathula
kirukkuriye
payalae

hey life is short-u
yaendi waitu ?
my beating is
my heart-u

yappa chappa
dappa dappa
tippu tappu 
dappaa dappaa

un udhattu rega
renda kaanom.
google glass-a
kondaa.

touch-u screenil onnu
ichchu screenil onnu
innu onnu thaaren
indhaa.

chilli rasamae
unna killi 
thinnum podhu oorum 
nesamae

adhi rasamaae
unna pichchi pichchi
thinna poraen 
dhinamae.

hey she is hottu
kadichchaa treat-u
life-e aachu sweetu !!

yappa chappa
dappa dappa
tippu tappu 
dappaa dappaa

Dhamma thundu
kannukulla enna
isuthukinnaa

Immaam size-u
nenjukulla
enna adachu kittaan

soupu boya
ninna enna.
super boy-ah
maaththi puttaa

manasa kasakki 
kadhal arakki 
sirichchaa!!!

yappa chappa
dappa dappa
tippu tappu 
dappaa dappaa
